description: Demolition of existing multi-storey car park and healthcare building and erection of part 5/part 6 storey building, for a mixed use development comprising retail (Class A1), 73 residential units (Class C3) and non-residential institutional use (Class D1), together with 947 (approx) car parking spaces (including basement parking) servicing area, formation of new vehicular accesses to Station Road and Augustus Lane, landscaping and other related works
